body_html:
The log message in your report is not an error message, but rather an information message. (I believe it's been removed in TF 1.4, because it was confusing people more than it enlightened them.)

You should be able to ignore the message and continue to use TensorFlow on your GPUs. Did the computation fail at a later point?
body_text:
The log message in your report is not an error message, but rather an information message. (I believe it's been removed in TF 1.4, because it was confusing people more than it enlightened them.)
You should be able to ignore the message and continue to use TensorFlow on your GPUs. Did the computation fail at a later point?
body:
The log message in your report is not an error message, but rather an [information message](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/624bcfe409601910951789325f0b97f520c0b1ee/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc#L847). (I believe it's been removed in TF 1.4, because it was confusing people more than it enlightened them.)

You should be able to ignore the message and continue to use TensorFlow on your GPUs. Did the computation fail at a later point?
